author: Simon Difford
description: Patience is a virtue. Slow dripping of the water is essential to dissolve the entire sugar cube and give the drink enough sweetness to balance the absinthe.
name: Absinthe Drip Cocktail (French method)

recipeInstructions.text: PLACE cube of sugar on a slotted absinthe spoon resting across the top of the glass
Using an absinthe fountain (or a bottle of chilled mineral water with a small hole in the cap), DRIP iced water over the sugar so it dissolves and drips into the glass
Traditionally the same amount of water is added as absinthe, but full-strength absinthe requires more dilution - Keep dripping until absinthe louches (turns milky white)
